title: Need to Identify these Fonts
content:
Wondering if anyone can identify attached fonts.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [AC.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20060519184737/http:/typophile.com/files/AC.jpg) | 35.18 KB |
author: carrie_gonzalez

comments.content: The font on the right is [Times Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20060519184737/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/times/bold/testdrive.html?s=AMERICAN+CAPITAL&p=48). The one on the left seems to be modified from [Bembo](http://web.archive.org/web/20060519184737/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/bembo/bembo/testdrive.html), or maybe started out as Bembo, but is several generations removed from the original artwork.
